name: Power Rangers Super Megaforce
description: The Megaforce Rangers face a new evil threat in a side-scrolling action game, providing a variety of maps loaded with an array of enemies and gimmicks. Lead your Ranger hero to the victory through battles, boss and Giant Robot fights! Call a partner character to fight alongside, use all the abilities and techniques of your character, including special attacks! Unlock and collect Rangers by using in-game rewards or scanning AR codes in Ranger Keys from the toy line by Bandai! (NOTE: Some Ranger Keys are not compatible with this Power Rangers Super Megaforce game.)
